
# You need to specify the separator between the integer part and the decimal part.
decimal_sep = "."


# TAPPy needs the variables 'year', 'month', 'day', 'hour', 'minute', 'water_level'.
# Any other variable name can be used as a placeholder.
parse = [('toss', integer),
         ('year', integer),
         ('month', integer),
         ('day', integer),
         ('hour', integer),
         ('minute', integer),
         ('water_level', real),
         ]
